title: A nice apartment room for rent in paris
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


A nice apartment room is available for rent starting from february 1st . the apartment is equipped with micro oven, refrigerator, washing machine and the room is equipped with cot, bed , table , chair and fan. i am looking for someone who is calm,clean and who loves privacy. .

The place is ideal for someone who like to live in a calm and peaceful environment.
it could be ideal for students and working expats.
the place is available for a short term and the rent is 400€ includes everything.

Kind regards and good day 😉
